archimate:DataObject.name: DunningNotification
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A DunningNotification is a communication or joint activity from the Telecommunication Operator to the customer to ask for a CustomerPayment or negotiate a PaymentPlan. The relation resulting from a DunningCaseRule might be â€¢ either only from the telecommunication operator to the customer (Ex: send a SMS) â€¢ or in both ways (Ex: a CSR call the customer to negotiate a PaymentPlan).
